activities: We aggregate our customer's employee data in order to provide performance information both to the employee and to the employer. We collect data about the work an employee is doing within their job function. We also collect enough information to identify individuals to themselves and their employers. The data is sent to us by the company and they have full control over what data is sent to us. We can receive this data in real-time or at intervals controlled by the customer.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: customer employee data - including manual and automatically processed data
